```{css, echo=FALSE}
.authors-row {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr); /* 每行 4 列 */
  gap: 20px; /* 每个作者之间的空隙 */
  align-items: start;
}

.author {
  text-align: center;
}

.author img {
  border-radius: 50%;
  width: 120px;
  height: 120px;
  object-fit: cover;
  display: block;
  margin: 0 auto 10px auto;
}


```
